import React,{useState} from 'react' import './booking.css' import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Booking = ({ tour, avgRating }) => { const { price, reviews } = tour; const Navigate = useNavigate() const [credentials, setCredetials] = useState({ userId: '01', userEmail: 'sag.nursultan@email.com', fullName: '', phone:'', guestSize: 1, bookAt: '' }) const handleChange = e => { setCredetials(prev => ({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value})) }; const serviceFee = 10 const totalAmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number (serviceFee) // send data to the server const handleClick = e =>{ e.preventDefault() } return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* booking form start */}
Information
{/* booking form end */} {/* booking bottom start*/}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
${serviceFee}
Total
${totalAmount}
{/* booking bottom start*/}
); }; export default Booking
